categories: Category:Heir to the Empire Sourcebook narratives

nodes.text: A Grand Admiral Returns is a short story written by Bill Slavicsek, originally published in the Heir to the Empire Sourcebook and later archived on Hyperspace. The story is set 8 ABY.

Captain Gilad Pellaeon awaits news from a mysterious contact that has ordered his Star Destroyer, Chimaera, to a meeting in space. Pellaeon is then surprised when the contact proves to be a blue-skinned alien who announces himself as a Grand Admiral and proclaims that the Galactic Empire's fortunes are about to change for the better.
